bug.short_desc: Uniify MWidgetController of list and tree widget

long_desc.thetext:
Currenty there are two powerful helper mixins
qx.ui.tree.core.MWidgetController
and
qx.ui.list.core.MWidgetController
used by controllers.
Both own many properties and methods with the same name. Only some functions differs. So I think, it could be useful to build an 'abstract mixin' or interface to offer basic functions in a central place and let the current mixins inherit from this basic mixin.
This could also be helpful for thinking about a controller based table widget.
What's do you think?
If you agree, I will try my best to find some time for implementing and creating a pull request.
